mapper.select: SELECT course_content.id, course_content.course_id, course_content.`name`, course_content.plan_time, course_content.begin_time, course_content.end_time FROM course_content WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_content (course_id, name, content, plan_time, begin_time, end_time) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{name}, #{content}, #{planTime}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE course_content SET course_id=#{courseId}, name=#{name}, content=#{content}, plan_time=#{planTime}, begin_time=#{beginTime}, end_time=#{endTime} WHERE id = #{id}
